website_summaries.verdict: The Asus Chromebook Flip (C100PA-DB02) blends the best elements from other designs into a single Chrome-based laptop with a slick, convertible form factor, fast performance, all-day battery life, and an affordable price.
pros: Rockchip RK3288C processor provides impressive performance
cons: Display resolution is lower than that of most other chromebooks

customer_reviews.title: A little marvel
customer_reviews.text: Performance is good, it's very small and light despite being all metallic and solid. The only downside I have encountered is the screen is very glossy. This is great for colour reproduction and use in tablet mode, but makes it very reflective. Battery life is astounding.
customer_reviews.author: Vestan Pance

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as his computer packed in. I persuaded him to get this smaller chromebook. He was very sceptical but he loves it. I should mention he's a senior citizen and isn't very techy. Well he loves it. He uses it every day now. Its very quick. The touchscreen is great too. Delivery was quick.I would thoroughly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: corrie

customer_reviews.title: So good I bought 2!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had my Chromebook a week and I love it, all the functionality of a laptop but in a manageable size. Starts up in a few seconds is great for browsing the web and answering emails, movies look great on the screen. I have always had tablets before but this really is the best of both worlds, you will not be disapointed and at this price in my opinion is a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Old Outlaw

customer_reviews.title: battery life is simply amazing: 2 days If you are not a massive ...
customer_reviews.text: The computer is gorgeous. You can switch on your Pc in 5 seconds, battery life is simply amazing :2 days If you are not a massive user, so you usually use a laptop to surf the Web, write a document and watch a video this is the computer for you. The only thing that I do not like is that the screen is too small, maybe 11 inch is better.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Sexy little computer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as my first chromebook in anticipation of soon being able to run Android apps on it, but in the meantime I'm surprised at how much I'm enjoying this little baby. Instant boot time, light enough to carry anywhere, foldable. It has replaced the iPad as the connected device that follows me around the house. For the price, I'm delighted with the value. Thinking of buying another one for my 12 year old nice.
customer_reviews.author: Olivier Weber

customer_reviews.title: You have to take it for what it is.
customer_reviews.text: You have to take it for what it is. A simple laptop/tablet computer. The battery is good and lasts a long time. The screen is nice and the keyboard is a bit small but big enough for me. My wife uses the laptop to write using Google docs and she prefers to us the laptop over the big powerfull PC we have. I'm waiting for the update that enables the Android apps. That will be interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really like this for the couple of hours I owned it ...
customer_reviews.text: Really like this for the couple of hours I owned it before the keyboard stopped working and it had to go back. May try getting it from John Lewis with the 2 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Looks better than it is.
customer_reviews.text: The problem when buying tech is that you never know how many people have used & sent the product back. I suspect that was the case with this cute little Chromebook which is functional but before a year of ownership. Issues with battery life & bluetooth. Asus make you jump through hoops to return it. The size & durability of the case is all it has going for it really.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: OK cheap laptop
customer_reviews.text: Lasted a year before it literally started falling apart at the hinges and the screen came off. Leaving a heavy book on it is enough to crack the screen but I am impressed that it managed to last so long since it was so fragile, I can still turn it on but with a detached screen I don't know how safe that is. The touchscreen did not last very long but was okay and it is nice and small like a tablet with a keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Aki

customer_reviews.title: Just what doctor ordered. Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This Asus Chromebook Flip is great technology and does work perfectly. I would recommend this to anyone who is interested of laptop / tablet combo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: annoying touch screen issues
customer_reviews.text: touchscreen keeps spazzing out, after a return it kept spazzing out, otherwise it would of been a decent bit of kit, likely due to cheap internal parts or poor testing.
customer_reviews.author: nabil

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Typing this review from my new favourite toy! Touch screen works great, size is ideal, turned up in impeccable condition and on time. Whats not to love!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Great Chromebook - Misleading Amazon deal
customer_reviews.text: Great Chromebook, but how stupid are Amazon offering a discount on Norton anti-virus with this item. Chromebooks don't need anti-virus software, and even if you were duped into buying it, it couldn't run on the Chromebook. So don't be fooled. This is the most secure operating system you can use.
customer_reviews.author: Skev

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for work and play
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, solid build, great keyboard, very fast. I am an author, and the extreme portability and auto backup is a boon to my productivity.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great product competetive price fast delivery Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, good price, excellent unit for grandchildren's new school for homework requirements. What ever happened to a pen and ink well and note book? Small foot print thin notebook pc which fits easily in to a school bag with all the other smelly stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. John Harris

customer_reviews.title: Novel Device
customer_reviews.text: A great product at a sensible price. Very compact and easy to use. As it has a totally operating system to Windows or OSX, it suffers no virus problems as standard computers do. Being Google Chrome, it will always be the latest version of browser. This can either be used as a standard laptop or the screen can fold over 180 degrees and be used as a tablet.
customer_reviews.author: dave90

customer_reviews.title: Great little device
customer_reviews.text: Great little device. I use it all the time. Relapsed my android tablet. Now with android app store and android apps (dev only). very good battery life. Don't expect chrome OS to replace a PC (unless you only use your pc for web stuff).
customer_reviews.author: Tim Francis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent device for anyone that heavily browses the web!
customer_reviews.text: A great little notebook that is snappy, quick and really useful. The Dev channel also enables android apps which is a nice feature and I look forward to it becoming a fully fledged update really soon.
customer_reviews.author: PatrickO'Prey

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Really great simple laptop, Light and small (good and bad) but also feels well built, polished and price is great
customer_reviews.author: Ali Raheem

customer_reviews.title: Genuinely an amazing purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews but this is lovely little piece of kit. Does everything you need it to and is more efficient, quick and simple to use than I ever would have thought. Genuinely an amazing purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: good fast machine
customer_reviews.text: Good product, fast and responsive once you Have got used to the different operating system. Looks good, nice and slim.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisJ

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this product, quality, functionality, price, software assistance from google. If you live is the navigation on the web and the mobility , this is the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the best Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: I am very glad because I purchased this Chromebook.It is made all of aluminum, it is Touchscreen and 360* good for presentation, movies and other activities.It has 4GB RAM that make this Chromebook very fast. During this fall We'll can dowload app from Play Store on our Chromebooks so it is the first choice this chromebook.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cristian R.

customer_reviews.title: OK but mousepad not great
customer_reviews.text: battery life not as good as some of the other chromebooks I've used and the mouse pad not that responsive to clicks. flip function is handy and touchscreen works well but speakers not that loud if trying to watch something.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Chromebook for homework
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter aged 8 who is having to do more and more of her homework online. This is the same Chromebook that she uses at school so it was easy for her to use and easy for me to set up. Shipped in a timely fashion to Hong Kong - thank you.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ackermann

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant. Musicians should like this one...
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant...simply cannot think of a single fault or improvement. Musicians.. you'll love the tent standing facility for playing from on screen scores...
customer_reviews.author: pondstrider

customer_reviews.title: App developer
customer_reviews.text: 2nd one purchased... way to go ASUS! very good feel and build quality. Used for developing new apps, working well so far!
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Quite Happy
customer_reviews.text: Very good, quick to boot, still have to relearn a few things. Only downside I have found is a doubling of my broadband usage. I am a very light user but now get close to my 20 Gig limit. Altogether pretty satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: G. P. Hick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent notebook, only issue memory size but that is reflected in price. Is simple to set up and use.
customer_reviews.author: John Wood

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Smart, sleek and perfect. I pondered for a long time purchasing a laptop and worried a little by the smaller screen, but it's absolutely perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Roses

customer_reviews.title: Small but packs a punch
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Screen sharp. Small but comfortable for my hands. Has the limitations of Chromebook (re downloads, etc...) Tablet function works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my daughter-in-law. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loving it as t is handy and very light weight to travel around
customer_reviews.author: lindy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little laptop for basic needs. Feels more expensive than it is.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: annoyed.
customer_reviews.text: this is the second one i bought within 3 months and touchpad wasnt working. i was send a new one which turns out is even older than my first one... annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: May be the best chromebook for quality at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Frank200002

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my Chromebook! Great price, super lightweight, compact and fast! It does everything I need and more.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Newby

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and does what it says on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous! Easy to use and does what it says on the tin!
customer_reviews.author: Skye

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good for the price , good quality , nice to be able to flip
customer_reviews.author: eugene ellis

customer_reviews.title: Love this device
customer_reviews.text: Love this device. Crazy long battery life even with high screen brightness and wifi activated. Won't replace your desktop computer, but a very good substitute for a laptop or tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Guy S.

customer_reviews.title: great chromebook.
customer_reviews.text: I love this chromebook, fits into a bag with ease. Great size, just what i wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent device for school
customer_reviews.text: Excellent device for school. Light and fits easily in the school bag. Great to have the option of keyboard or touch screen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my wife and sh can't spend more than a half an hour away from it.
customer_reviews.author: T A JACKSON

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality. Looks like a little macbook and now runs Android apps!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great price, if it broke would I buy again? Absolutely
customer_reviews.author: killmycrew

customer_reviews.title: The Chromebook is a wonderful device for work or play
customer_reviews.text: The Chromebook is a wonderful device for work or play. The first setup of it was very fast, compared to a traditional laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Chromebook. Screensize is ok
customer_reviews.text: Great Chromebook. Screensize is ok, resolution is acceptable and good for the price. Touchscreen works very well. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Wefers Verastegui

customer_reviews.title: This is a great device! You really cannot expect more for something ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great device! You really cannot expect more for something at this price point. We are very content.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Bjernerup

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little Chromebook. I'm very happy with this purchase. I very much recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Furtado Pereira

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping and the chrombook is very very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Ramírez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great chromebook superb build quality and nice ips panel.Great battery life.Love it
customer_reviews.author: vladas

customer_reviews.title: perfect if you have an air printer
customer_reviews.text: fab, like a mini apple laptop, i live the aluminium. its a pain that it doesnt print by cable, and doesnt recognise my bluetooth printer either, and getting used to not having office is sometimes hard, but if you're in the market for this, then you should know that already. also it doesnt work with garmin devices etc, if that matters to you. despite that, for start up time and reliability, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: AMDBY

customer_reviews.title: Great little Chromebook-notebook-tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Great little Chromebook-notebook-tablet. I've had a Chomebook before, and the OS is fine so long as your use is lightweight. I've yet to install Linux on this, but I will be doing so soon. Solid feel, and getting the expected battery life. The only gripe is the wasted space all the way around the screen, but that's a minor issue. (Paid £209 for mine on Amazon -- a snip and worth every penny so far.)
customer_reviews.author: NN

customer_reviews.title: Cracking piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: We spent a long time considering what to replace out Acer notebook with. We decided on the this Asus and we couldn't be happier - its a cracking machine. It's quick, it's light, it handles videos (via Amazon Prime) with ease, and the battery lasts all day long. The keyboard has a nice touch and the overall build is really pleasing (compared to low priced PCs). We have a external hard drive as well as Drive and needless to say it works effortlessly. It's used for work and pleasure, great for taking to meetings or when we stay away from home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The keyboard is a little on the small size but more than good enough. The touchpad is large and works well
customer_reviews.text: The look and feel of the all metal construction has the touch of quality. The keyboard is a little on the small size but more than good enough. The touchpad is large and works well. This is my first touch screen laptop and I was amazed by how natural it is to move between keyboard, touchpad and touch screen is. Make sure you order the 4GB version. Performances is more than good enough and with the addition of Android apps this Chromebook is a stand out laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Morrish AKA PendragonUK

customer_reviews.title: highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: fantastic. Works great and I have put this through its paces. Love it so much that the mother in law got me to order her one too. I can play games, wright code and do everything Elise I was doing on my laptop on this. I bought this more for the touch screen aspects as my right hand stored working, and being right handed I was struggling with my laptop. This far excess ed my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: n stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Nice machine, works well but way too flimsy. The screen cracked after few weeks - I think probably due simply to flexing on opening against a fairly stiff hinge - this kills the touchscreen, which is an essential feature. Being physical damage this is not covered by warranty. Quoted circa £250 to repair by ASUS. So, effectively a write off. Not good!
customer_reviews.author: MR S WALKER

customer_reviews.title: Ideal toy/tool for a traveler.
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure if I would like this Chromebook after the superb Toshiba Chromebook 2 but I love it. It can do Skype & Spotify as well. I like the charger socket you can put it any way round and the whole charger is quite tiny Really an ideal toy/tool for a traveler. Who need windows anyway?
customer_reviews.author: Dr Lawn

customer_reviews.title: So pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with this product. It's great value for money. Personally I use it for note-taking, which is super-convenient as it's small, lightweight, portable and has a long battery life. It's perfect for browsing online (as you'd expect from a Chromebook).You will ideally always need to be connected to the internet to use this most effectively (though there are a few offline apps and functions). It's designed to be readily taken around. I love the hardware and functionality - it works wonderfully as both a laptop and a tablet. Great purchase! Couldn't recommend more if you are looking for a Chromebook.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.......
customer_reviews.text: Been a "chromey" for about 3 years, this Asus model is summed up in one word, "awesome"!
customer_reviews.author: Richard M

customer_reviews.title: real life review
customer_reviews.text: Battery not as good as I though during normal browsing/youtube playback; there is some cracking when you hold it with one hand, seeming something is not well glued or pieced together. Other than that it is a very speedy and excellent hybrid - you can do everything in the cloud; plus there is Play Store with Android apps.
customer_reviews.author: PTSeeker

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed - slow and clunky
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth Chromebook. I am disappointed with it. It is slow and clunky. I wrote to the supplier about this and they kindly offered to take it back but, you know, I just could not be bothered with the whole process - at least it works. Meh - hence 3 stars. 2018.06.19 - UPDATE: I have had this thing for 9 months now - and it is worse - slow and clunky - sick of the awful thing and have today decided to ditch it - good riddance.
customer_reviews.author: D. Black

customer_reviews.title: Great performer let down by faulty touch screen.
customer_reviews.text: As notebook PC's go this is a decent performer. It feels fast and responsive to android games and that's the reason I got it. It does however suffer from a touch screen that, on mine at least, now no longer works and has made the device useless to me and to be perfectly honest has driven me crazy at times. I see from other reviews that I am not the only person with this problem. Avoid this device if you value your sanity!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great bit of kit.. using it often and loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely bit of kit
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for better than a tablet but not a laptop, this satisfies that. Phenomenonal battery life. Some tweaking needed to work offline. Plenty of help with questions via on line forums. Really like it, read the on line reviews to check this is for you, as don't forget it is a different operating system and not all the apps you would expect will be available.
customer_reviews.author: Mr H.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic to use
customer_reviews.text: The first one delivered had wi-fi connection issue, was exchanged by Amazon with no issues. Fantastic to use, so nice not to use Microsoft or Apple. I enjoy technology again, not bad for a Luddite.
customer_reviews.author: Don W

customer_reviews.title: A very high value and nice alluminium Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: A very high value and nice alluminium Chromebook. In addition, it is possible to install Arch Linux on an SD card. I come from Germany and have the device GB ordered because it is not available unfortunately in Germany. I am certain that the device could be sold well in Germany.
customer_reviews.author: Dümpelmann

customer_reviews.title: Great, works really week for 1080p youtube videos
customer_reviews.text: Great, works really week for 1080p youtube videos... keyboard is excellent... touchpad is nice and smooth... feels like a £700 laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with chrome
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a backup laptop very good but it is not windows
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Watson

customer_reviews.title: Totally loved it. It's a very good price for what ...
customer_reviews.text: Totally loved it. It's a very good price for what you get. I use it mainly for travelling and it's so light and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca Marcos

customer_reviews.title: very good for a used one
customer_reviews.text: they sent me product which was made 1 year earlier but good quality anyway, small and light charger (suitable for traveling)
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: It's a great idea, but the execution didn't work for me. The screen was a little _too_ small, and the software a little _too_ basic. I returned it and bought another Mac.
customer_reviews.author: Trev

customer_reviews.title: chromebook
customer_reviews.text: it is exactly as described it is a gift for a fifteen year old so as yet hasn't been used but i am sure he will be very pleased with it is very light and flips over very easily definitely met my expectations
customer_reviews.author: lynne shannon

customer_reviews.title: Asus CP100PA
customer_reviews.text: Small appliance maintenance-free OS, if you work with web applications only (e.g. Google Apps) you will be satisfied...www.test-recenze.cz
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Parental Controls
customer_reviews.text: The build quality of the device is exceptional. I was blown away by the quality of it and for me it would be fine. However I bought this for my child. I added a supervised user account which is made useless because you cant add anything from the app store There is also no way of limiting usage times. The other disappointment is that the apps store does not have minecraft or terraria which isn't the devices fault but Im left wondering if android tablet with a keyboard would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Chris64

customer_reviews.title: Carry it around. A great little machine.
customer_reviews.text: A bargain at the price. Dependable, quick, handy to have around and it runs android apps out of the box. Pro: huge standby battery life, it will last for weeks. Cons: utterly useless Bluetooth. Won't find speakers, headphones or phone even if you hold it right next to the Chromebook. Or, if it does, it will have lost the connection next time you open it.
customer_reviews.author: John Hannibal Swift

customer_reviews.title: Excellent chromebook implementation
customer_reviews.text: Excellent chromebook implementation. Ideal to have both chromebook functionality, android apps and linux when travelling. (weighs less than 1kg). Charger has odd plug, which is annoying (always need to take this specific charger), but it's 12V so charging is quick (less than 2 hours) Keyboard is better than expected, size is good. Left shift is rather small which caused some mistakes for me in the beginning. Trackpad is sufficient but not great, loud when push-clicking so I tend to use the 'tap to click' Overall, well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Marcel van der Boom

customer_reviews.title: Love my Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: Love my Chromebook. Using it now. Looks quality being all aluminium. Android store (Beta) makes Chromebooks all the more viable and versatile. You will need a gmail account which automatically gives 15GB of cloud storage. You then get an additional 100GB, for 2 years, with this Chromebook making 115GB. After 2 years you have the option to pay and its not much at all for 12 months to secure your info (less than the price of a takeaway). This unit gives you the advantages of a 10 inch tablet but a nice solid, easy to use keyboard too.
customer_reviews.author: Whiten

customer_reviews.title: very pleased with the c1000pa loads as fast as my Imac ...
customer_reviews.text: very pleased with the c1000pa loads as fast as my Imac play store beta works fine bbc news weather flight radar firefox all work very good for travel good by windows it's mac and chrome (beta) store for me
customer_reviews.author: lynx

customer_reviews.title: Great value and very stylish
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Google Chrome product. I'm using this as my go to portable device. Was a bit sceptical about Chrome products until now and am really impressed with the value for money this product offers. If you are aware that this is mostly an online machine you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: The chromebook is very light and it is not slow for basic things like writing notes, browsing the web or watching video. So far so good. But the build quality is lacking. There are some internal cables that have worn off. Now the keyboard doesn't work (certain keys don't register) and the device spontaneously shuts itself down at random (from 1 to 60s). This issue is rather widespread. Try googling keyboard issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ithought it woulld be better than it is!! freezes every so often like its predecessor!
customer_reviews.author: Crispin Fordham

customer_reviews.title: Great for a lot of things. Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely lovely but a tad too small. Comes with Google play installed but not all apps work on it. Ex: Word, Excel or any app which requires gps.
customer_reviews.author: send2cristea

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted, but unusable after a year
customer_reviews.text: I've owned one of these for about 15 months. Up until about 2 months ago I would have given in 4 or 5 stars, however I now experience pages crashes every couple of minutes ("Aw snap). I've tried every troubleshooting recommendation and so I wrote to Asus. Reading between the lines of their reply they suspect the memory is somehow faulty. However it's out of warranty now so it's probably not economical to repair (by the time I've paid shipping and inspection etc.) This is a real shame because I've had a great year's use out of it, but for £250 I'd expected to be able to use it longer
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Irvine

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my chromebook however having problems with running a virus check as recommended. Can anybody help?
customer_reviews.author: gail t

customer_reviews.title: If you like ChromeOS this is great, if not stay clear of it.
customer_reviews.text: Build quality is amazing, but ChromeOS is rubbish. Don't buy it to try and run android apps or install/run Linux on it. It won't do anything other than run ChromeOS. It won't play nicely with SMB or WebDAV shares, or network printers. It's an ARM processor, so don't think you can do anything other than run ChromeOS on it. Trust me - I've tried everything!
customer_reviews.author: Tim O.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was cheap, but also feels cheap (when compared to a normal laptop).
customer_reviews.author: Martin Schoeberl

customer_reviews.title: Operating System Failure
customer_reviews.text: The operating system failed 3 time and to eventually ask to be refunded.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A very irritating computer
customer_reviews.text: Works most of the time, but very irritatingly. It is impossible to temporarily disable the touch screen feature, meaning that if you accidentally lightly touch the screen some unwanted window will open up. Also, weirdly, the screen sometimes starts jumping around like some faulty 1970s TV. Can't wait for it to be old enough to justify my getting a new - and different! - laptop.
customer_reviews.author: The consumer's best friend

customer_reviews.title: I already have an Acer chromebook which I love, but it is only 2 RAM
customer_reviews.text: I already have an Acer chromebook which I love, but it is only 2 RAM, so thought this would be a good upgrade. Not the case. Managed to set the machine up, but couldn't then do anything, it kept glitching, freezing, showing me a blank screen. Couldn't even get into googlemail. Going back today, really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: HBlaber

customer_reviews.title: ... can't really blame the equipment so the unit is fine but Chrome is awful
customer_reviews.text: I can't really blame the equipment so the unit is fine but Chrome is awful. No decent Imap email everything is a right pain to sort. Google will need to do a lot of work to get people to move away from Windows or IOS. Shame as the Asus is cheap enough and good for the price but seriously let down by Chrome.
customer_reviews.author: Mark K.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have only had the thing 24 hours - how om earth can I rate sensibly?
customer_reviews.author: Lancs Peter

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star
customer_reviews.text: I loved this so much I bought another for my wife. Bit different at first but you soon get the hang of it. So light and small and the battery seems to last forever when put side by side with even a good laptop. No lag nothing brill bit of kit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: ASUS C100PA 10.1 Inch Chromebook Flip (Rockchip 3288 Processor, 4 GB RAM, 16 GB eMMC, Chrome OS, 1280x800 Touchscreen, HD Web Camera) - Metallic Silver
product_meta.description:
ASUS Chromebook Flip C100, a touchscreen Chromebook featuring a 360 degrees hinge that enables it to function in a variety of modes, including traditional notebook, tablet, stand and tent. From note taking in class to sharing videos with friends at a local coffee shop to pulling all-nighters, the ASUS Chromebook C100 lets you communicate, share and play in a variety of ways.

The 10.1 inch HD (1200 x 800) IPS display with wide viewing angle and multi-touch capability enhances your Chrome OS experience in every usage scenario. ASUS, touch sensor technology offers accurate and responsive touch so you can be confident that what you touch will be processed without lag.

The ASUS Chromebook Flip was designed aesthetically to turn heads and functionally to withstand your active lifestyle. Featuring a seamless aluminium chassis, it is stronger, more durable and sleeker than the average plastic chassis Chromebook. Weighing in at 2 lbs with a thickness of only 0.6 inch, the ASUS Chromebook Flip confidently goes wherever and whenever you go.



BOX CONTAINS
Asus Chromebook
AC Adapter
User Documentation
feature_bullets: Full 360-degree flip so you can enjoy your Chromebook in any mode
Touchscreen for easy engagement with apps and content
Chromebooks give you secure access to the Chrome Web Store, with thousands of apps designed to make your everyday life easier.
With up to 9 hours battery life, you can enjoy Chromebook Flip C100 throughout the day while on the move
